text: A crowd of mixed ancestry also went up with them, with livestock in great abundance, both flocks and herds.
From the other side of the Jordan, of the Reubenites, Gadites, and the half-tribe of Manasseh, men equipped with every kind of weapon of war: one hundred and twenty thousand.
The second choir proceeded to the left, followed by myself and the other half of the administrators, along the top of the wall past the Oven Tower as far as the Broad Wall,
Simon likewise built up Adida in the Shephelah, and fortified it by installing gates and bars.
Expiation for the Dead. Judas rallied his army and went to the city of Adullam. As the seventh day was approaching, they purified themselves according to custom and kept the sabbath there.
Then some of the scribes and Pharisees said to him, “Teacher, we wish to see a sign from you.”
In the course of his teaching he said, “Beware of the scribes, who like to go around in long robes and accept greetings in the marketplaces,
And should he come in the second or third watch and find them prepared in this way, blessed are those servants.
in order that the word which Isaiah the prophet spoke might be fulfilled: “Lord, who has believed our preaching, to whom has the might of the Lord been revealed?”
